channel.title: IF Answers - Recent questions tagged third-party

item.title: The inform IDE is only so flexible for text editing. Do I have to use it?
item.description: If so, when is it best to use? Is there a danger when using another text editor?

item.title: How do I keep track of/prioritize bugs? Do I need to fix something right when I see it?
item.description: Is there a non-automagical way to keep track of what I need to do?

item.title: How do I build an I7 project from the command line in Windows?
item.description: Apparently it's easy in Linux, but this bugged me for a long time, so I'll spell it out.
